projects.title: Test the resilience of your information system, application or website !
projects.description: My goal will be to put to the test the security of anything and everything that you want me to test, finding their vulnerabilities and telling you how to correct them. Within a predefined scope. A single website or the whole information system. With informations of the system to test (white box) or without anything (black box).

projects.title: Determine how to protect the most valuable assets of your company !
projects.description: I will identify, estimate and prioritize the risk associated with your assets, determining how to protect them and how to respond to a potential breach, following the ISO standards.

projects.title: Sensibilize your employees about the grave danger of phishing !
projects.description: The main vulnerability of IT systems is the human factor ! Your employees will receive a phishing campaign, without being aware that it is a test, and statistics gathered from the campaign will demonstrate how careless people are and how dangerous it is. Then a sensibilization of the danger of phishing will lead your employees to be more careful in the future. Phishing icons created by kerismaker - Flaticon
